name: Garouf Lafoe
Lore: 'Free-trader who imports ice chunks from rings of Ohann and Adriana, outer planets in Tatoo system. Sales remain cold...due to steep Imperial taxes and bribes.',
Text: 'Adds 1 to power of anything he pilots. Adds 1 to forfeit of each of your characters at same Tatooine site. Subtracts 1 from forfeit of each of opponent''s characters at same Hoth site. Game text suspended if at same site as a tax collector.',
